member.name: T:Vector.Vector
member.summary: A demonstration of defining a module from H & R, Functional Programming Using F#. Note: Bad style, better use augmented types. How to compile: fsharpc --doc:Vector.xml -a Vector.fsi Vector.fs fsharpc --doc:testVector.xml -r Vector.dll testVector.fsx Author: Jon Sporring. Date: 2015/10/27 A 2 dimensional vector type, whose elements are floats.
